cards.rules_text: You may cast spells that are exactly three colors without paying their mana costs.

cards.rules_text: You may have Moonstone enter the battlefield as a copy of any land on the battlefield or any land card in a graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

The first noncreature spell you cast each turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is The Holy Word's toughness.
As long as your devotion to red, white, and blue is less than eight, The Holy Word is a 1/1 Illusion creature with hexproof. [i](Each {R}, {W}, or {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red, white, and blue.)[/i]

{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You may cast a spell from your hand with mana value X or less without paying its mana cost, where X is twice The Soul of Winterisle's power. Activate only as a sorcery.
As long as your devotion to blue, red, and green is less than eight, The Soul of Winterisle is a 1/1 Illusion creature with hexproof. [i](Each {U}, {R}, or {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue, red, and green.)[/i]

Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 0/0. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to Elandra, Lady Eternal's power.

Whenever Gurgle, Jolly Jelly enters the battlefield or attacks, creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Gurgle's power.

Gleeb, A Man for All Seasons gets +1/+1 for each color you have three or more devotion to.
Gleeb has first strike as long as your devotion to white is three or more. The same is true for flying and blue, lifelink and black, menace and red, and trample and green. [i](Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)[/i]
